text: KFXH (88.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to Marlow, Oklahoma, United States. The station is currently owned by Houston Christian Broadcasters, Inc. KFXH broadcasts a religious format to the Duncan, Oklahoma, area. ==History== This station was assigned call sign KFXH on April 28, 2008. ==References== ==External links== *http://www.khcb.org/network/kfxh_marlow.php FXH Category:Radio stations established in 2010 Category:2010 establishments in Oklahoma
title: KFXH
